verses.roman:
tāṅ-sabāra prasāde mile śrī-prabhura pāya
prabhu-kṛpā vinā mora rājya nāhi bhāya

synonyms: tāṅ-sabāra prasāde—by the mercy of all of them; mile—one gets; śrī-prabhura pāya—the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prabhu-kṛpā—the mercy of the Lord; vinā—without; mora—my; rājya—kingdom; nāhi—does not; bhāya—appeal to me.
translation: "By the mercy of all the devotees, one can attain the shelter of the lotus feet of the Lord. Without His mercy, my kingdom does not appeal to me.
